title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 130.8 - Statement of origin of regulated articles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 130.8 - Statement of origin of regulated articles

State Regulations

Every person selling or delivering or attempting to sell or
deliver, or ship regulated articles, as defined in section
130.3
of this Part, in this State, shall accompany each such load, bundle, package or shipment of the same with a
legibly written statement of origin which shall contain the address of the
lands on which such regulated articles were grown, obtained, or cut, and the
name and address of the consignor and consignee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
130.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
